'''Ardent Soul''' is [[Xinyan]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Xinyan's hair is pulled back into two buns with spiked bands.

Xinyan wears a black-brown tank top fastened by knots and white shorts, with a red and white vest with flared red, black, and white sleeves. She has a black and red ribbon tied around her right leg, and a netted sock on her left. She also carries a drum on her back.
